monster.name: Dracó d'Emboscada
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The drake té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de drake's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Atac Sorpresa
entries: Si the drake sorprèn a una criatura i l'impacta durant la primera ronda de combat, l'objectiu rep, adicionalment, 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage from the attack.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Azbara is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as his habilitat de llançament de conjurs ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Azbara has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Azbara has two {@item spell scroll (1st level)||scrolls} of {@spell armadura de mag}.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
entries: When Azbara casts an evocation Cantrips and misses, or the target succeeds on its saving throw, the target still takes half the cantrip's damage but suffers no other effect.

trait.name: Sculpt Spells
entries: When Azbara casts an evocation spell that affects other creatures that he can see, he can choose a number of them equal to 1+the spell's level to succeed on their saving throws against the spell. Those creatures take no damage if they would normally take half damage from the spell.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o ranged 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Blagothkus can innately cast the following spells ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur), requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Blagothkus is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as his habilitat de llançament de conjurs ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Blagothkus has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: Blagothkus has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Blagothkus attacks twice with his morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On his turn, Othelstan can take one additional action.

trait.name: Tiamat's Blessing of Retribution
entries: When Othelstan takes damage that reduces him to 0 hit points, he immediately regains 20 hit points. If he has 20 hit points or fewer at the end of his next turn, he dies.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Othelstan attacks twice with his flail or spear, or makes two ranged attacks with his spears.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o ranged 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Fanàtic del Drac
entries: The dragonclaw té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition charmed} o {@condition frightened}. While the dragonclaw pot veure un drac o un Cultista del Drac aliat i de més categoria ignora els efectes d'estar {@condition charmed} o {@condition frightened}

trait.name: Avantatge del Fanatisme
entries: Un cop per torn, if the dragonclaw makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, it deals an 7 ({@dice 2d6}) dany extra.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The dragonclaw té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de dragonclaw's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragonclaw attacks twice with its scimitar.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Fanàtic del Drac
entries: The dragonwing té avantatge a salvar contra ser {@condition charmed} o {@condition frightened}. While the dragonwing pot veure un drac o un Cultista del Drac aliat i de més categoria ignora els efectes d'estar {@condition charmed} o {@condition frightened}

trait.name: Avantatge del Fanatisme
entries: Un cop per torn, if the dragonwing tira impacte amb avantatge i impacta l'objectiu rep 7 ({@dice 2d6}) dany extra.

trait.name: Vol Limitat
entries: The dragonwing pot, com a acció bonus al final del seu torn, obtenir una velocitat de vol de 30 peus.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The dragonwing té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de dragonwing's no {@condition incapacitated} a 5 peus.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dragonwing attacks twice with its scimitar.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage of the type to which the cultist has resistance.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Dralmorrer is a 7th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as his habilitat de llançament de conjurs ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Dralmorrer has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Dralmorrer té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When Dralmorrer uses his action to cast a cantrip, he can also take a bonus action to make one weapon attack.

trait.name: Weapon Bond
entries: Provided his longsword is on the same plane Dralmorrer can take a bonus action to teleport it to his hand.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Dralmorrer attacks twice, either with his longsword or dagger.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o ranged 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Frulam is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Saviesa as her habilitat de llançament de conjurs ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Frulam has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Frulam attacks twice with her halberd.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany contundent.

monster.name: Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Jamna is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intel·ligència as her habilitat de llançament de conjurs ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Jamna has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list.

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: Jamna can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Astúcia Gnoma
entries: Jamna has advantage on Intel·ligència, Saviesa and Carisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Jamna attacks twice with her shortswords.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, o 9 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) plus ({@dice 1d6}) de dany perforant if the target is Medium or larger.

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: On his turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

trait.name: Crític Millorat
entries: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Langdedrosa attacks twice, either with his greatsword or spear.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o ranged 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: Langdedrosa breathes lightning en una línia de 30 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Each creature in the line ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: Leosin Erlanthar is presented in {@adventure Hoard of the Dragon Queen|HotDQ} as a half-elf monk. The {@creature martial arts adept|vgm} statblock from {@book Volo's Guide to Monsters|VGM} has been provided here for ease of use.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant.

items.name: 5etools Note
entries: Ontharr Frume is presented in {@adventure Hoard of the Dragon Queen|HotDQ} and The {@adventure Rise of Tiamat|RoT} as a lawful good, human paladin of Torm. The {@creature war priest|vgm} statblock from {@book Volo's Guide to Monsters|VGM} has been provided here for ease of use.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Saviesa as his habilitat de llançament de conjurs ({@dc 13} salvada de conjur, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Pharblex pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Poison Strike (3/Dia)
entries: Un cop per torn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

trait.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: Pharblex has advantage on Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar. 5 peus d'abast o ranged 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Rath is an 11th-level spellcaster who uses Intel·ligència as his habilitat de llançament de conjurs ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Rath has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Rath has a {@item staff of fire}, and scrolls of {@spell porta dimensional}, {@spell descens de ploma}, and {@spell bola de foc}.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Illusory Self (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When a creature Rath can see makes an attack roll against him, he can interpose an illusory duplicate between the attacker and him. The attack automatically misses Rath, then the illusion dissipates.

monster.name: Rezmir

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Rezmir has the {@item Black Dragon Mask|hotdq}, {@item Hazirawn|hotdq}, and an {@item insignia of claws|hotdq}.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Rezmir pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Dark Advantage
entries: Un cop per torn, Rezmir can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when she hits with a weapon attack, provided Rezmir has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Inefabilitat Dracònica
entries: Si no vesteix armadura però duu Black Dragon Mask, Rezmir afegeix el seu modificador de Carisma a la CA (ja inclòs).

trait.name: Immolation
entries: When Rezmir is reduced to 0 hit points, her body disintegrates into a pile of ash.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (1/Dia)
entries: If Rezmir fails a saving throw while wearing the Black Dragon Mask, she can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Greatsword (Hazirawn)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. The target can make a {@dc 15} Constitució saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending this effect early on a success.

action.name: Caustic Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} a impactar, 90 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Alè de Acid {@recharge 5}
entries: Rezmir breathes acid en una línia de 30 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Each creature in the line ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendaryHeader: If she is wearing the Black Dragon Mask, Rezmir can take up to two legendary actions between each of her turns, taking the actions all at once or spreading them over the round. A legendary action can be taken only at the start or end of a turn.

legendary.name: Darkness (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends from a point Rezmir can see within 60 feet of her and s'extén per les cantonades. The darkness lasts as long as Rezmir maintains concentration, up to 1 minute. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the area overlaps with a area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

legendary.name: Melee Attack
entries: Rezmir makes one melee attack.

legendary.name: Hide
entries: Rezmir takes the Hide action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Talis is a 9th-level spellcaster that uses Saviesa as her habilitat de llançament de conjurs ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Talis has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Talis has {@item +1 scale mail} and a {@item wand of winter|hotdq}.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: Talis té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition charmed} i no pot patir son màgicament

trait.name: Winter Strike (3/Dia)
entries: Un cop per torn, when Talis hits with a melee attack, she can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o ranged 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The troll has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The troll recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troll attacks five times, once with its bite and four times with its claws. If two or more claws hit the same target, the troll rends the target, dealing an extra {@dice 2d6} de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.
